I own the Original, its basically just a repress of the disc with the word gold added to the cover, disc and manual. on the back of the manual is an Xbox live redeem code that lets you download all the extra content free in one go, so yeah this version is no more gold than the old version, no code = no extras
Delete the word GOLD, its just the normal version of RE5, except if you own redeem code!!!!!
